alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 08 at 2:05AM PST until March 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 feet possible above 6500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Thursday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1500 to 2500 feet today. Snow levels 3000 to 5000 feet Thursday, rising quickly to 6000 to 8000 feet by Friday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
